entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow, -8.3°C

Observed at: CFB Trenton 10:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

Temperature: -8.3°C

Visibility: 0.0 km

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries or blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
